sense.def:
Staples
so kratki kosi žice, s katerimi spenjamo liste papirja. Skozi papir jih potisnemo s spenjačem.

To staple something
pomeni nekaj nekam pritrditi s sponkami za papir.

seg.quote: The letter was stapled to the other documents in the file.

sense.def:
Obrok ali hrana, ki je
staple
, je osnova človekovega vsakdanjega jedilnika.

seg.quote: ...the dry bread which is their staple diet.
